item.title: Male Voiceover Artist For YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for a voiceover artist for my YouTube Channel. I do not want AI at all, and I want something similar to this channel: https://www.youtube.com/@bartmotorcycle

You'll be paid $10/hour - $15/hour. The time depends on the length of the video. So if the length of the video is an hour and your rate is $10/hour, you'll be paid $10. If the rate of the video is 30 minutes and your rate is $10/hour, you'll be paid $5.

I'd also request a trial task before we proceed, so make sure that you're ready for that.

I expect a turnaround time of 24 hours - 36 hours.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 13:09 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Male, Voice-Over, Voice Acting, US English Dialect, Middle-Aged Adult, Audio Editing, Young Adult, Narration, British English Accent
Skills: Male, Voice-Over, Voice Acting, US English Dialect, Middle-Aged Adult, Audio Editing, Young Adult, Narration, British English Accent
Country: Malaysia
click to apply

item.title: Video/Audio AI Project - Selfie Videos - Upwork
item.description:
Self-Videos for AI mapping – Earn up to USD35

These are the languages we need now:
Tamil, Telugu, Russian, Cantonese, Mandarin, Turkish, Portuguese (Portugal), Italian, Spanish (Only from Spain - don't apply if you are native from Latin America) (Native only!)

Please check the PDF file for more details.

**** Do not apply if your accent is not native to these regions, as your videos may be rejected, and you could lose all your work. The positions for ENGLISH language are FILLED! ****

Job Description:
We wanted to share a project that our company is working on with Adobe, which involves crowdsourcing people for a video/audio AI project. It's a fun project where all you must do is record yourself answering some questions and upload the videos to a Google Drive. This project involves you recording up to 10 videos of yourself on your phone and answering a few simple questions. It will take 20 - 30 minutes to complete.

Please note that it may take 80 to 90 days to receive payment for
this job, after evaluation and approval of the videos.

As long as you use a modern phone with 4K video, follow the directions, record in 4K and 60 FPS, your video(s) should be approved and you will be paid for each video. As well, if your video is approved, you won’t have to submit more recordings. Your uploaded videos will be accepted as the final files, so submit up to 10.

The purpose of this project is to provide training data for AI Voice models from real people in everyday settings. Your video and audio will not be used to create a clone or replication and will not be seen or heard by anyone outside of Voxpe or the client.
Watch this video for a quick walkthrough of how to record yourself with the correct specifications.

If any of your friends and family members would like to participate in this project just let me know!


Please check the PDF file for more details.

Budget: $35
Posted On: June 16, 2024 13:03 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:M4V, MOV, Autobiography, Testimonial Video, Video Production, Voice Acting
Skills: M4V, MOV, Autobiography, Testimonial Video, Video Production, Voice Acting
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Podcast - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled and creative Video Editor to edit our podcast episodes. The ideal candidate will have experience in editing audio and video content to create engaging and high-quality podcasts. The main responsibility will be to edit the raw podcast footage, including removing any mistakes, adding transitions, sound effects, and enhancing the overall visual and audio quality. The Video Editor should have a strong attention to detail, excellent organizational skills, and the ability to work independently. This is a great opportunity to join our team and contribute to the success of our podcast.

Skills needed:
- Proficient in video editing software
- Familiarity with podcast editing techniques
- Strong attention to detail
- Excellent organizational skills
- Ability to work independently

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 12:45 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Skills: Audio Editing, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Creating a course on our company on Go High Level on Membership section - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled and motivated E-Learning Content Developer to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for developing engaging and informative e-learning courses using the Go High Level platform under the Memberships feature. The focus of these courses will be on our product offerings, sales strategies, and business systems. You will work closely with our team, receiving video recordings and detailed information about our business to create effective and interactive training modules for each section.

Key Responsibilities:

E-Learning Content Development:

Develop and design e-learning courses on Go High Level under the Memberships feature.
Ensure the content is engaging, interactive, and easy to understand.
Incorporate multimedia elements such as videos, quizzes, and interactive activities.
Video Integration:

Review and integrate video recordings provided by the team into the e-learning modules.
Edit and enhance video content as needed to ensure clarity and engagement.
Content Organization:

Structure the e-learning content in a logical and user-friendly manner.
Break down complex topics into manageable sections and modules.
Collaboration:

Work closely with subject matter experts to understand the products, sales strategies, and business systems.
Gather detailed information about the business to accurately reflect it in the training modules.
Collaborate with the team to receive feedback and make necessary revisions to the content.
Quality Assurance:

Conduct thorough testing of the e-learning modules to ensure they function correctly and provide a seamless user experience.
Ensure all content is accurate, up-to-date, and aligned with the company's standards and goals.
Qualifications:

Proven experience in developing e-learning content, preferably using the Go High Level platform.
Strong proficiency in e-learning authoring tools and multimedia editing software.
Excellent organizational and project management skills.
Ability to break down complex information and present it engaging and easy-to-understand.
Strong attention to detail and commitment to producing high-quality content.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$60.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 12:29 UTC
Category: Marketing Strategy
Skills:Business with 10-99 Employees, Online Instruction, Writing, Creative Writing
Skills: Business with 10-99 Employees, Online Instruction, Writing, Creative Writing
Country: GBR
click to apply

item.title: Video Creator and Editor for YouTube Channel (If you are good, this will be a long-term opportunity) - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and motivated video creator and editor for a long-term collaboration to produce high-quality YouTube videos. The videos will be based on existing examples such as:

https://youtu.be/LYdhopM3shE?si=GDGhxK1sdeL8eLcx
https://youtu.be/j9r-RHVF1NA?si=_nLaAjkABWa5Qelp
https://youtu.be/Ep5nJW9Ohd8
https://youtu.be/yyMx7SU6GLg?si=rMWoir9C5njMCdPU

These videos are created by combining existing video clips, adding animations, and using hyper-realistic AI voice-overs.

Responsibilities:

✔️Create and edit engaging videos for our YouTube channel using provided scripts and references.
✔️Incorporate appropriate animations, images, short videos, and social media/news screenshots.
✔️Utilize video creation tools to produce high-quality content.
✔️Ensure the videos are polished, attention-grabbing, and meet our quality standards.
✔️Understand the script thoroughly to deliver the intended message effectively.
✔️Meet deadlines consistently and communicate proactively about any potential delays.

Skills Required:

✔️Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
✔️Experience with animation and motion graphics.
✔️Ability to find and incorporate relevant images, videos, and other media from the internet.
✔️Knowledge of AI voice-over tools is a plus.
✔️Strong attention to detail and a good understanding of visual storytelling.

Preferred Qualifications:

✔️Previous experience in creating similar YouTube content.
✔️A portfolio showcasing relevant video projects.
✔️Strong work ethic, reliability, and motivation to produce high-quality work.

Additional Information:

We value creativity and passion for video creation. We are looking for someone who enjoys the process and is not just motivated by money. Attention to detail and adherence to deadlines are crucial.

To ensure you have read the full job description and understand each requirement, please include the phrase "I create magic with videos" at the beginning of your proposal and also include one paragraph about the video examples we used to describe how you can recreate them in a different way, and this paragraph should start using the term “Example video para” if you will not do above two things; we do not consider the to read your proposal.


Budget: $20
Posted On: June 16, 2024 12:28 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Photo Slideshow, Documentary, Concept Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Photo Slideshow, Documentary, Concept Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: Italy
click to apply
